name: The cursed office
description:
Play as an office worker who wants to quit his boring job. But wait, something is not normal. The building seems to have infinite offices that look weirder the further you get.

Also Seizure warning;

We are missing a few things like lighting which we theoretically have but we had some problems so it is not included right now.

Music and sounds may be added in the future.

Controls:

SEDF - move; left click: interact
